actions.name: Copy Selected Text
actions.script: echo "$SELECTED_TEXT" | pbcopy && echo "Copied ${SELECTION_COUNT} lines to clipboard"

actions.name: Copy File Path
actions.description: Copy current file path to clipboard

actions.name: Copy with Line Numbers
actions.description: Copy selected text with line numbers
actions.script: echo "File: $FILE_PATH (Lines $LINE_START-$LINE_END)" | pbcopy && echo "$SELECTED_TEXT" | pbcopy && echo "Copied with metadata"

actions.name: Copy All Information
actions.script:
echo "File: $FILE_PATH
Language: $LANGUAGE
Lines: $LINE_START-$LINE_END ($SELECTION_COUNT selected)
Total: $TOTAL_LINES lines
Current: Line $CURRENT_LINE

Selected Text:
$SELECTED_TEXT" | pbcopy && echo "Copied complete information"
